Module com.example.helloworldjfxtemplate
Package com.example.helloworldjfxtemplate.controller

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
com.example.helloworldjfxtemplate.controller.LoginController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LoginController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Handles the Login function of the first scene. Validates user input based on given information in the database.

  • Constructor Details

    • LoginController

      public LoginController()

  • Method Details

    • onClickUsername

      public void onClickUsername()
      Gathers the username string from the TextField and only checks whether the username field is not populated. Gives an alert, which will be in French if the user's system language is French.

    • onClickPassword

      public void onClickPassword()
      Gathers the password string from the TextField and only checks whether the password field is not populated. Gives an alert, which will be in French if the user's system language is French.

    • onClickSubmit

      public void onClickSubmit(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      Handles the validation of the username and password, as well as logging the failure or success of the user to log in to the program. Displays alerts if the password or username is incorrect, and displays those alerts in French is the user's system language is French.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - ActionEvent given by the Submit button which is used to navigate to the main-menu FXML form.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Exception thrown by the UserDaoImpl if the User does not exist.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Displays the user's current location in a Label, and if the user's System Language is French, sets the appropriate Strings to their French equivalents and sets the isFrench boolean for reference in alerts.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The URL of the login FXML file.
      resourceBundle - Used for localized resources like language files or images.

    • logToFile

      public static void logToFile(String log)
      Handles the recording of user logs in a login_activity.txt file within the root folder.
      Parameters:
      log - User activity logs given by the Save functionality.

    • getUsername

      public static String getUsername()
      Used to reference which user is creating or updating a given Customer or Appointment.
      Returns:
      Returns the Username given by the User when they successfully log in.
